text: Sporosarcina is a genus of bacteria. The cells of Sporosarcina are either shaped like a rod or like a bowl (coccoid). Most species are able to move (motile).pp. 377â€“378 All species of Sporosarcina are capable of aerobic respiration using oxygen. p. 92 Some species have the enzyme urease and can break down urea. The species S. ureae is common in the soil where cattle live. == References == Category:Gram-positive bacteria
title: Sporosarcina
